-e ---

𐘐 *21F

belonging to gender series:

𐘡 E 𐙛 •ES 𐙛 𐘠𐘂 mixed neuter ? 𐀴 ti ⋍ 𐙛 •ŠI 𐀯 si 𐘤•SI she? as in 𐘏 : 𐘑 : 𐚽/𐘐 she-goat sheep capre

Syllabic sign:

1 𐙀𐙕𐘈𐘦𐘐𐙈 ZU-𐙕-SE-DE-21F-118 ( 𐘐𐙈 own word x3 ) 1 𐘅𐘐𐘗𐘻𐘅 NA-21F-NE-MI-NA 𐘗𐘻𐘅 NE-MI-NA word of its own! 1 𐘹𐘐𐘭𐘅 TU-21F-RI-NA 1 𐘇𐘈𐘹𐘐 A-SE-TU-21F 1 𐘇𐘀𐘐𐘭 A-DA-21F-RI 1 𐘐𐘭𐘹𐘌 *21F-RI-TU-QA 1 𐘉𐘯𐘐 U-NU-21F 1 𐘅𐘐𐘗 NA-21F-NE 1 𐘐𐘱𐘬 *21F-JA-DU 1 𐘐𐘹 *21F-TU 2 𐘱𐘐 JA-21F 3 𐘐𐘹𐘗 21F-TU-NE 3 𐘐𐙈 *21F-118
